basRIP.name: basRIP
basRIP.contactinfo: Dheerendra Talur Postal: BAS Systems 1595 Spring Hill Road 5th Floor Vienna, VA 22182 Phone: 703-245-4561 E-Mail: dtalur@bas.com
basRIP.description: This module defines a portion of the proprietary management information base (MIB) for managing routing information protocol (RIP).

ripIfStatsIntfCnt.name: ripIfStatsIntfCnt
ripIfStatsIntfCnt.description: Number of enabled interfaces running RIP

ripIfStatsNbrCnt.name: ripIfStatsNbrCnt
ripIfStatsNbrCnt.description: Total number of neighbors of all RIP interfaces

ripIfStatsPktsRcvd.name: ripIfStatsPktsRcvd
ripIfStatsPktsRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets received on all interfaces

ripIfStatsPktsSent.name: ripIfStatsPktsSent
ripIfStatsPktsSent.description: Total number of RIP packets sent out on all interfaces

ripIfStatsReqsRcvd.name: ripIfStatsReqsRcvd
ripIfStatsReqsRcvd.description: Total number of RIP requests received on all interfaces

ripIfStatsReqsSent.name: ripIfStatsReqsSent
ripIfStatsReqsSent.description: Total number of RIP requests sent out on all interfaces

ripIfStatsRspsRcvd.name: ripIfStatsRspsRcvd
ripIfStatsRspsRcvd.description: Total number of RIP responses received on all interfaces

ripIfStatsRspsSent.name: ripIfStatsRspsSent
ripIfStatsRspsSent.description: Total number of RIP responses sent out on all interfaces

ripIfStatsRteTimouts.name: ripIfStatsRteTimouts
ripIfStatsRteTimouts.description: Total number of RIP routes timed out

ripIfStatsShrtPktsRcvd.name: ripIfStatsShrtPktsRcvd
ripIfStatsShrtPktsRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with size less than RIP header size received on all interfaces

ripIfStatsBadVerRcvd.name: ripIfStatsBadVerRcvd
ripIfStatsBadVerRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with version other than RIP version 1 or RIP version 2, received on all interfaces

ripIfStatsBadZeroRcvd.name: ripIfStatsBadZeroRcvd
ripIfStatsBadZeroRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with must be zero fields not set to zero, received on all interfaces

ripIfStatsBadSrcPortRcvd.name: ripIfStatsBadSrcPortRcvd
ripIfStatsBadSrcPortRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets which did not originate from port 520, received on all interfaces

ripIfStatsBadSrcIpRcvd.name: ripIfStatsBadSrcIpRcvd
ripIfStatsBadSrcIpRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with invalid ip address, received on all interfaces

ripIfStatsPktsFrmSelfRcvd.name: ripIfStatsPktsFrmSelfRcvd
ripIfStatsPktsFrmSelfRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with receiver being the sender on all interfaces

ripIfStatsReset.name: ripIfStatsReset
ripIfStatsReset.description: Writing a 1 in ripIfStatsReset has the effect of clearing current RIP statistics

ripIfAllStatsIntfCnt.name: ripIfAllStatsIntfCnt
ripIfAllStatsIntfCnt.description: Number of interfaces (enabled and disabled) running RIP

ripIfAllStatsNbrCnt.name: ripIfAllStatsNbrCnt
ripIfAllStatsNbrCnt.description: Total number of neighbors of all RIP interfaces

ripIfAllStatsPktsRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsPktsRcvd
ripIfAllStatsPktsRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets received on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsPktsSent.name: ripIfAllStatsPktsSent
ripIfAllStatsPktsSent.description: Total number of RIP packets sent out on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsReqsRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsReqsRcvd
ripIfAllStatsReqsRcvd.description: Total number of RIP requests received on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsReqsSent.name: ripIfAllStatsReqsSent
ripIfAllStatsReqsSent.description: Total number of RIP requests sent out on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsRspsRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsRspsRcvd
ripIfAllStatsRspsRcvd.description: Total number of RIP responses received on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsRspsSent.name: ripIfAllStatsRspsSent
ripIfAllStatsRspsSent.description: Total number of RIP responses sent out on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsRteTimouts.name: ripIfAllStatsRteTimouts
ripIfAllStatsRteTimouts.description: Total number of RIP routes timed out

ripIfAllStatsShrtPktsRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsShrtPktsRcvd
ripIfAllStatsShrtPktsRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with size less than RIP header size received on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsBadVerRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsBadVerRcvd
ripIfAllStatsBadVerRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with version other than RIP version 1 or RIP version 2, received on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsBadZeroRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsBadZeroRcvd
ripIfAllStatsBadZeroRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with must be zero fields not set to zero, received on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsBadSrcPortRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsBadSrcPortRcvd
ripIfAllStatsBadSrcPortRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets which did not originate from port 520, received on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsBadSrcIpRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsBadSrcIpRcvd
ripIfAllStatsBadSrcIpRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with invalid ip address, received on all interfaces

ripIfAllStatsPktsFrmSelfRcvd.name: ripIfAllStatsPktsFrmSelfRcvd
ripIfAllStatsPktsFrmSelfRcvd.description: Total number of RIP packets with receiver being the sender on all interfaces

basRipIfTable.name: basRipIfTable
basRipIfTable.reference: Scalable Routing IDD. Section on RIP.
basRipIfTable.description: This is used for proprietry interface info.

ripIfIpAddress.name: ripIfIpAddress
ripIfIpAddress.description: Ip address of the interface running RIP

ripIfAddressLessIf.name: ripIfAddressLessIf
ripIfAddressLessIf.description: IfIndex of the interface running RIP

ripIfType.name: ripIfType
ripIfType.description: Type of the interface running RIP

ripIfVersion.name: ripIfVersion
ripIfVersion.description: What the router sends on this interface. ripVersion1 implies sending RIP updates compliant with RFC 1058. ripSendCompat implies broadcasting RIP-2 updates using RFC 1058 route subsumption rules. ripSendVer2 implies multicasting RIP-2 updates. ripSendVer1Demand indicates the use of Demand RIP on a WAN interface under RIP Version 1 rules. ripSendVer2Demand indicates the use of Demand RIP on a WAN interface under Version 2 rules.

ripIfRecvVer.name: ripIfRecvVer
ripIfRecvVer.description: This indicates which version of RIP updates are to be accepted. Note that ripRcvVer2 and ripRcvVer1and2 implies reception of multicast packets.

ripIfMetric.name: ripIfMetric
ripIfMetric.description: Value of metric corresponding to this interface. Metric value will be added to all routes leared from this interface

ripIfAcceptDefault.name: ripIfAcceptDefault
ripIfAcceptDefault.description: If ripIfAcceptDefault is TRUE then default routes will be accepted on this interface

ripIfSilent.name: ripIfSilent
ripIfSilent.description: If ripIfSilent is TRUE then no RIP updates would be sent of by this interface

ripIfRecvRoutes.name: ripIfRecvRoutes
ripIfRecvRoutes.description: If ripIfRecvRoutes is TRUE then RIP updates received on this interface are disregarded

ripIfSendDefaultOnly.name: ripIfSendDefaultOnly
ripIfSendDefaultOnly.description: If ripIfSendDefaultOnly is TRUE, RIP update from this interface would consist of only the default route

ripIfSendDefaultAlso.name: ripIfSendDefaultAlso
ripIfSendDefaultAlso.description: If ripIfSendDefaultAlso is TRUE, RIP update from this interface would consist of default route along with other routes

ripIfDfltRouteMetric.name: ripIfDfltRouteMetric
ripIfDfltRouteMetric.description: This variable indicates the metric that is to be used for the default route entry in RIP updates originated on this interface.

ripIfSplitHorizon.name: ripIfSplitHorizon
ripIfSplitHorizon.description: If ripIfSplitHorizon is TRUE, enables split horizon processing as defined in RFC 1058

ripIfPoison.name: ripIfPoison
ripIfPoison.description: In ripIfPoison is TRUE, enables Poison reverse updates on this interface. (Poison reverse is defined in RCF 1058)

ripIfFlash.name: ripIfFlash
ripIfFlash.description: if ripIfFlash is TRUE flash updates will be sent out from this interface following a route change

ripAuthOn.name: ripAuthOn
ripAuthOn.description: If ripAuthOn TRUE enables authentication on this interface. All updates generated from this interface would be authenticated using specified authentication type set by ripIfAuthType

ripIfAuthType.name: ripIfAuthType
ripIfAuthType.description: The type of Authentication used on this interface.

ripIfAuthKeyId.name: ripIfAuthKeyId
ripIfAuthKeyId.description: md5 authentication keyid used for this interface. RFC2082 describes md5 authentication and keyids

ripIfAuthKey.name: ripIfAuthKey
ripIfAuthKey.description: The value to be used as the Authentication Key whenever the corresponding instance of ripIfAuthType has a value other than noAuthentication. A modification of the corresponding instance of ripIfAuthType does not modify the rip2IfConfAuthKey value. If a string shorter than 16 octets is supplied, it will be left- justified and padded to 16 octets, on the right, with nulls (0x00). Reading this object always results in an OCTET STRING of length zero; authentication may not be bypassed by reading the MIB object.

ripIfUpdateInterval.name: ripIfUpdateInterval
ripIfUpdateInterval.description: Time between 2 RIP updates for this interface

ripIfUpdateInterPktGap.name: ripIfUpdateInterPktGap
ripIfUpdateInterPktGap.description: Time between sending 2 packets of the same RIP update when update is more than 1 packet

ripIfPktsPerUpdate.name: ripIfPktsPerUpdate
ripIfPktsPerUpdate.description: Maximum number of packets allowed per update on this interface

ripIfPortDown.name: ripIfPortDown
ripIfPortDown.description: Indicates if port on which this interface exists is down.

ripIfRowStat.name: ripIfRowStat
ripIfRowStat.description: Administrative control over, creation and enabling RIP interface

basRipNbrTable.name: basRipNbrTable
basRipNbrTable.reference: Scalable Routing IDD. Section on RIP.

ripNbrIfIpAddr.name: ripNbrIfIpAddr
ripNbrIfIpAddr.description: Ip address on the RIP interface of which this is a neighbor

ripNbrAddressLessIf.name: ripNbrAddressLessIf
ripNbrAddressLessIf.description: If index of the RIP interface on this this is a neighbor

ripNbrType.name: ripNbrType
ripNbrType.description: Neighbor type is ripNbrTypeConfigured if it is configured on the interface. A neighbor is of type discovered it is not configured and updates from this neighbor are received on this interface

ripNbrLastUpdate.name: ripNbrLastUpdate
ripNbrLastUpdate.description: Time simce last update was received from this neighbor

ripNbrTriggerMode.name: ripNbrTriggerMode
ripNbrTriggerMode.description: Indicates if the neighbor is triggered or not

ripNbrRowStatus.name: ripNbrRowStatus
ripNbrRowStatus.description: Administrative control to creat and delete a neighbor
